title: Saratoga Falcon Newspaper
description: Over my four years with the CSPA award-winning Saratoga Falcon newspaper, Iâ€™ve taken on these positions: Opinion Editor, School Scope Editor, and Staff Writer. In addition to the editor roles of proposing story ideas and editing and writing articles, I also ran writing workshops, facilitated inter-grade-level support, copy-edited, drew editorial cartoons, and represented the school in the JEA/NSPA National High School Convention.

title: What Learning Looks Like
description: Allowing students from across the world to share experiences and perspectives amid the COVID-19 pandemic. Connected with students from 10+ countries. The site was featured by Chalkbeat.

title: "Musings" Blog
description: Studying the current state of America's democracy through the lens of science and data.
